name: shopify-buy
description: The JS Buy SDK is a lightweight library that allows you to build ecommerce into any website. It is based on Shopify's API and provides the ability to retrieve products and collections from your shop, add products to a cart, and checkout.

scripts.build2: npm run dir-setup-dist && npm run build-all && npm run minify-all
scripts.start2: npm run dir-setup-dist-test && npm run dir-setup-dist && concurrently 'npm run watch-test' 'npm run build-test-sdk' 'http-server -p 4200 .dist-test/'
scripts.examples2: npm run dir-setup-dist-test && npm run dir-setup-dist && npm run cp-examples && npm run css-examples && http-server -p 4200 .dist-test/
scripts.test2: npm run dir-setup-dist-test && npm run dir-setup-dist && npm run build-test && npm run build-test-sdk && testem ci
scripts.test-examples2: npm run dir-setup-dist-test && npm run dir-setup-dist && npm run build-test && npm run build-test-sdk && npm run cp-examples && npm run css-examples && npm run test-run-example
scripts.test-ci2: npm run dir-setup-dist-test && npm run dir-setup-dist && npm run build-test && npm run build-test-sdk && testem ci -R xunit > tests.xml
scripts.build-all: concurrently 'npm run umd' 'npm run umd-polyfilled' 'npm run commonjs'
scripts.umd: rollup -f cjs src/shopify.js | node scripts/runBabel umd | node scripts/addHeaderToSource.js > dist/shopify-buy.umd.js
scripts.umd-polyfilled: rollup --config .rollup.config.umd.polfilled.js | node scripts/runBabel umd | node scripts/addHeaderToSource.js > dist/shopify-buy.umd.polyfilled.js
scripts.commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel -d lib/ src/ && node scripts/addVersion lib/version.js
scripts.build-test: concurrently 'npm run build-tests-polyfill' 'npm run amd' 'npm run build-tests'
scripts.watch-test: concurrently 'npm run build-tests-polyfill' 'npm run watch-amd' 'npm run watch-tests'
scripts.build-tests: npm run build-tests-qunit-shim && npm run build-test-eslint && npm run build-tests-amd
scripts.watch-tests: npm run build-tests-qunit-shim && npm run watch-tests-amd
scripts.build-tests-polyfill: npm run umd-polyfilled && npm run copy-umd-build
scripts.watch-tests-amd: nodemon --exec 'npm run build-tests-amd && npm run build-test-eslint' -w src/
scripts.build-test-sdk: concurrently 'npm run copy-qunit' 'npm run copy-html' && node scripts/build-testing-sdk.js > .dist-test/sdk-testing.js
scripts.amd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=amd babel src/ | node scripts/addHeaderToSource.js > .dist-test/shopify-buy.amd.js
scripts.mk-examples: npm run mk-cart && npm run mk-checkout

author: Shopify Inc.
